content:
Hi All

As the newly formed HL7 Terminology Services Management Group (TSMG) does not yet have a means to add its own conference calls to the HL7 Conference Call system please consider this a reminder of the TSMG regular meeting for this week.

Date / Time:
Tue Sep 28, 2021 05:00 PM (US Eastern Time, GMT -4 DST)
Tue,Sep 28, 2021 21:00 PM (UTC)
Please consult http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20210928T1700&p1=784 for your local times.

Web Meeting Info
https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/95054745574?pwd=RXhhTjdsWktUYjJQRXJFTW10NGpRZz09

Agenda / Meeting Notes
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/TSMG/2021-09-28+TSMG+Meeting+notes

For further information or if you encounter any problems, please contact a member of the TSMG via Zulip (chat.fhir.org) in the #TSMG stream.

Thank you and kind regards,
Reuben (Interim TSMG Co-chair)
